title: Tumblr Reverses Nudity Ban
description: Reversing a 2018 ban, the company said that nudity and “mature subject matter” would be allowed. But “visual depictions of sexually explicit acts” remain off limits.
dc:creator: Claire Fahy
media:credit: Thiago Prudencio/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Getty Images
media:description: The blogging site Tumblr lost about a third of its traffic after it announced in 2018 that it was banning explicit posts.
